channel.title: Where are private servers now?
channel.description:
I've got quite a few questions and I really don't know where to start answering them myself, So I'm hoping that I could get some help getting educated on how far private servers have come since I was last involved..
So here is a question..
Alright I've noticed alot of 500+ server threads.. such as 508 and so on.. Honestly I really lost all interest in the whole private server world long before these DeltaScape was even released.. so as you could imagine I'm REALLY far behind on things, Though, I have tinkered with Delta on a few occasions but never really got into it, So could someone fill me in on what all has happened with servers since the old 317's?

item.title: Where are private servers now?
item.dc:creator: @justinxg27 justinxg27
item.description:
@justinxg27 wrote:

PS are right next to Jagex’s skills atm.

Read full topic

item.title: Where are private servers now?
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:10, topic:343809”][quote author=`jeba link=topic=440198.msg3235724#msg3235724 date=1276459581]

459 - Skillcapes
474 - Godwars + Godsword
503 - Summoning
508 - Stable version of 503?
525 - Dragon claws, PvP Armour
554 - New HP Bars
582 - Curse Prayers
601 - New Skill

Sigh… Obviously people have no idea about any other updates - they just name the ones everyone else mentions.
420 - New sidebar icons with old chatbox.
440 - Barb assault (somewhere here.)
445 - Varrock update (I might of gotten the number wrong though)
459 - Skillcapes, new animations(including skillcapes)
460 - Ditch
462 - ClanChat
474 - Godwars, Godswords
482 - Bounty hunter, wilderness pking removed, F2P given duel arena and team capes.
483 - Bounty hunter bug fix.
484 - Summoning
489 - Bounty hunter (1v1) update.
500 - new graphics. (Bobble heads)
503 - Summoning update
508 - Stability fix, client adapted to lag less.
525 - Dragon claws, PvP Armour
530 - New magic spell icons
535 - Soul wars (I think I put this way to late…)
542 - BH world. (No attack option)
543 - BH world. (15 mins later with attack option)
557 - BH world update - BH items added.
562 - New weapon models.
582 - Curse Prayers
602 - Dungeonqueering + stupid max level limit.

I might edit this later
[/quote]

youre right for the most part.
the updated varrock didnt come until like 474, not 435, ive looked at 455 maps and the varrock floormap is almost identical to the 317.
i thought soul wars came after the new sideicon update? (the new sideicons came after like 544)
new magic icons came after the new sideicons, so 530 is a little early.[/quote]

530 was the new magic icons, I’m pretty sure Luke132’s server contained them. It’s either that - or the hide buttons.

Varrock update came out as 462, I remember the post on R-S

Read full topic

602 - Dungeonqueering + stupid max level limit.

I might edit this later[/quote]

item.title: Where are private servers now?
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:7, topic:343809”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=440198.msg3235170#msg3235170 date=1276408389]

Well, the highest revision RSPS is working with (And actually getting anywhere) is a 601, which is the first stable client base since RuneScape’s new skill came out. Since the 317 era there have been a few popular revisions to build off of, 459, 474, 503, 508, 525, 554, 582, and 601. Each of those client revisions mark the start of something special in RSPS. If im not mistaken these are the key updates to those clients.
459 - Skillcapes
474 - Godwars + Godsword
503 - Summoning
508 - Stable version of 503?
525 - Dragon claws, PvP Armour
554 - New HP Bars
582 - Curse Prayers
601 - New Skill
Those are just the big things you get with those revisions IMO. (please correct me if I’m wrong)

There are also lower revision clients that load higher revision caches. (508 loading 525, 601 loading 602). The most popular higher revision base remains to be the 508(IMO).
317’s are sill very popular bases and for the most part, are the most common bases found on moparscape.

Need me to elaborate on any of that? Or do you want to know something else?

Isn’t 484 summoning? 503 is summoning update 2.
[/quote]
Could be, Idk.[/quote]Ye, summoning came out before the new graphics, which was 503.

Also, private servers since the “old” 317’s have gotten less and less original. Most of them either have the same content or same idea. Rarely do I see a new minigame or idea implemented in a private server today. No on wants to take the time to make a decent server anymore. It’s all about releasing, releasing, releasing, and they all suck. And if they don’t suck, they’re most likely being hosted for money.

Read full topic

item.title: Where are private servers now?
item.dc:creator: @Get_Forgotten Get_Forgotten
item.description:
@Get_Forgotten wrote:

[quote=“LegionOfDoom, post:2, topic:343809”]Delta is what happened. When something new comes out, people rush to it. They’d rather have the coolest up to date server out there, that they can barely understand, rather than have a server where they understand every part of its protocal. Basically people want to be spoon fed. They’d rather have a 508+ server where everything is added, rather then some 317-474 where they acctually have to do work.

Thats my opinion on things.[/quote]

True… But then again that’s always been true…

Although this doesn’t really answer the question at hand I appreciate your input

Read full topic
